discussion_comments.commented_code: @@ -164,12 +155,30 @@ const TableEditorMenu = () => { Viewing protected schema -
discussion_comments.comment_body: this Alert_Shadcn can be replaced by ProtectedSchemaWarning?

Shouldn't this be
```
  if (isLoading) return 'Checking status'
  if (isSuccess) {
    if (status === 'UNHEALTHY') return 'Unhealthy'
    if (status === 'COMING_UP') return 'Coming up...'
    if (status === 'ACTIVE_HEALTHY') return 'Healthy'
  }
  if (isProjectNew) return 'Coming up...'
  return 'Unable to connect'
```

isSuccess shouldn't be mashed with status imo

i realised this is confusing but `isSuccess` here isn't from react-query, so its not indicative of a successful network request

![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c13c6b75-d518-4ea3-beba-f69de3d391c2)
lemme refactor this to change `isSuccess` to `isHealthy`, its very easily confused haha
